title: Installation issue: tau on NERSC Cori w/ Intel 19.1.1.217
body:
Using `spack@develop` (3-Aug, 4c97a0ea1cbcb42fff4cb2183552b6b6c441d791) on **NERSC Cori** (`cray-cnl7-haswell`) with `%intel@19.1.1.217`:

`tau` concretized spec: [tau.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5031512/tau.spec.yaml.txt)
Build Log: [tau-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5031510/tau-build-out.txt)



```
$> spack install -f ./tau.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing tau
==> No binary for tau found: installing from source
==> tau: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    './configure' '-prefix=/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/tau-2.29-les6ofkjkp7wmqw7chdplzylvr4zhalj' '-arch=craycnl' '-pdt=/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/pdt-3.25.1-3uvcw7bqycjef5gaix2aakpcsfqopv5b' '-pthread' '-papi=/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/papi-6.0.0.1-54rkhbuyvjejiu3t252ioehlttpg4bjc' '-iowrapper' '-bfd=/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/binutils-2.33.1-rudq32li4ggwhcdhh72zr2zkl57zritp' '-dwarf=/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/libdwarf-20180129-6qum4wyj4xgfrtygaltfx7taz6sbde6n' '-elf=/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/libelf-0.8.13-pe2ayziczc4k72h5knsviv6mgn3hfbsb' '-unwind=/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/libunwind-1.4.0-pmpcewqqqa3imp2apq5mzbdfdk64imwq' '-otf=/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/otf2-2.2-zebrzinrhwn75fjfjde63e3qd7mhedq6' '-mpi' '-c++=CC' '-cc=cc' '-fortran=ifort' '-useropt=-O2 -g -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/tau-2.29-les6ofkjkp7wmqw7chdplzylvr4zhalj/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/tau-2.29-les6ofkjkp7wmqw7chdplzylvr4zhalj/lib64 -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/binutils-2.33.1-rudq32li4ggwhcdhh72zr2zkl57zritp/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/hwloc-2.2.0-h5azrafw2dob3dtfzi55ughp5emepdw3/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/libdwarf-20180129-6qum4wyj4xgfrtygaltfx7taz6sbde6n/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/libelf-0.8.13-pe2ayziczc4k72h5knsviv6mgn3hfbsb/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/libunwind-1.4.0-pmpcewqqqa3imp2apq5mzbdfdk64imwq/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/mpich-3.2.1-awal2t46rtyjjjo4ggqaauea7y5c3fnd/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/otf2-2.2-zebrzinrhwn75fjfjde63e3qd7mhedq6/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/papi-6.0.0.1-54rkhbuyvjejiu3t252ioehlttpg4bjc/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/pdt-3.25.1-3uvcw7bqycjef5gaix2aakpcsfqopv5b/lib -Wl,-rpath,/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/zlib-1.2.11-oyg3d4lenw6b66sgqg5wvff5c3b3xpgb/lib'

See build log for details:
  /tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-tau-2.29-les6ofkjkp7wmqw7chdplzylvr4zhalj/spack-build-out.txt
```

A relevant part of the log (attached at top):
```
...
Checking for CrayCNL shared library compatibility... yes
Default C++ compiler will be CC
Setting F90 compiler based on requested: ifort
Default Fortran compiler will be Intel ifort
ERROR: /include (CRAY_MPICH2_DIR/include) is not readable. Please configure with -mpiinc=<dir> to point to the MPI include directory.
```

@wspear @shahzebsiddiqui
